name: Selective Serotonin Shooter (WebGL)
description:
WebGL version (x64 here), play in fullscreen, not mobile (requires keyboard)

I've been taking antidepressants for more than a year. The mysticism surrounding their course of action is fascinating, as well as unpredictable effects and strict timetable you have to adhere to when taking them. So - why not a game about it?

Do you have what it takes to survive week on SSRIs? Currently in beta.
